brainly_data.question:
Steve is good at setting up and managing groups of computers for large cities. In which Information Technology career pathway is he most likely to get a job? Information Support 
Programming Development 
Interactive Media 
Network Systems
brainly_data.subject: Business

all_answers.question:
Steve is good at setting up and managing groups of computers for large cities. In which Information Technology career pathway is he most likely to get a job? Information Support 
Programming Development 
Interactive Media 
Network Systems
all_answers.subject: Business
all_answers.text: Interactive media would be most suitable for Steve as he would be exposed to a wide variety of hands on media production.
